dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile health m health is an extremely broad term that embraces mobile communication in the health sector and data packaging The four broad categories of wireless networks are wireless personal area network wireless metropolitan area network wireless wide area network and wireless local area network Wireless local area network is the most notable of the wireless networking tools obtainable in the health sector Transfer of delicate and critical information on radio frequencies should be secure and the right to use must be meticulous This article covers the business opportunities in m health threats faced by wireless networks in hospitals and methods of mitigating these threats
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T17:34:21Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2012-12-13
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
